Title: The Chinese Communist Party fully represents the basic interests of the greatest majority of the Chinese people
Designer: Beijing zhongtong shi'ao tuwen sheji zhongxin (北京中通世奥图文设计中心)
Publisher: Zhongguo huabao chubanshe (中国画报出版社)
Notes: From a series Propaganda posters to welcome, propagate, carry out the "Sixteenth Party Congress" (Yingjie, xuanchuan, guanche "shiliuda" xuanchuanhua - 《接，宣传，贯彻“十六大”宣传画).The title refers to one of Jiang Zemin's 'Three Represents'.
Tags: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
中国共产党全国代表大会
